column4: we meet all the friends from the Hundred Acre Wood."

"A mouse taking a walk in the woods.": "With the arrival of spring and fine weather outside
column4: the good-natured Mole loses patience with spring cleaning. He flees his underground home
column5: emerging to take in the air and ends up at the river
column6: which he has never seen before. Here he meets Rat (a water vole)
column7: who at this time of year spends all his days in
column8: on and close by the river. Rat takes Mole for a ride in his rowing boat. They get along well and spend many more days boating
column9: with Rat teaching Mole the ways of the river."
